entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , La Ronge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Ronge Airport 08:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning. Periods of freezing rain over southern sections early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
